data.name: ReadAdministrativeAction
data.value: select top(1) TYPE, DESCRIPTION from CKT_ADMIN_ACTION where TYPE = @type

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = 'R')

data.name: ReadFips
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, COUNTY_DESC, STATE_ABBREVIATION, COUNTY_ABBR from CKT_FIPS where (LOCATION = @location) and (COUNTY = @county) and ([STATE] = @state)

data.name: ReadFipsTribAddress
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, COUNTRY, TRB_ID from CKT_FIPS_TRIB_ADDR where @trbId = TRB_ID

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, COURT_CASE_NO, TRB_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, LGA_ID, OB_DSC from CKT_OBLIGATION where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) order by OB_ID desc

data.name: ReadObligationAdmActionExemptionAdministrativeAction
data.value: select T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.AAT_TYPE, T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DT, T1.END_DT, T1.LAST_NM, T1.FIRST_NM, T1.MIDDLE_INITIAL, T1.SUFFIX, T1.REASON, T1.CREATED_BY, T1.CREATED_TSTAMP, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, T1.DESCRIPTION, T2.DESCRIPTION from CKT_ADMIN_ACTION T2 join CKT_OADM_ACT_EXMP T1 on (@otyType = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.TYPE = T1.AAT_TYPE) order by T1.EFFECTIVE_DT desc

data.name: ReadObligationLegalActionTribunal
data.value: select T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T1.OB_DSC, T2.COURT_CASE_NO, T2.TRB_ID, T3.JUDICIAL_DIVISION, T3.TRIBUNAL_NM, T3.FIP_LOCATION, T3.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T3.FIP_COUNTY, T3.FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL T3 join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T2 join CKT_OBLIGATION T1 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T1.LGA_ID) and (T2.COURT_CASE_NO = @courtCaseNo) on T3.IDENTIFIER = T2.TRB_ID order by T1.OB_ID desc

data.name: ReadObligationObligationType
data.value: select top(1) T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T1.OB_DSC, T2.DEBT_TYP_CD, T2.DEBT_TYP_NM from CKT_OB_TYPE T2 join CKT_OBLIGATION T1 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.OB_ID = @obId) and (T2.DEBT_TYP_ID = T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId)

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, DEBT_TYP_NM from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId

data.name: ReadServiceProvider1
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_INITIAL from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where USER_ID = @userId

data.name: ReadServiceProvider2
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_INITIAL from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where USER_ID = @userId

data.name: ReadTribunal
data.value: select top(1) JUDICIAL_DIVISION, TRIBUNAL_NM, FIP_LOCATION, JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, IDENTIFIER, FIP_COUNTY, FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL where IDENTIFIER = @identifier
